Undoubtedly, each one of us is passionate about the work we do, our country and cares what is happening around us : @PiyushGoyal
The future of any nation is determined by the confidence that the youth has, in their own abilities and the work that they do : @PiyushGoyal
We really want to do better for the society & take this country to the greater heights : @PiyushGoyal
When I go a village, despite all the problems that they're facing, I see a sense of pride in them for whatever they're doing : @PiyushGoyal
There is a large section of society which is completely insulated from difficulties that a common man has to face in India : @PiyushGoyal
We are not able to take pride in all the good that's happening in country, landing up to be critics : @PiyushGoyal
This is the time when we have to choose what will be our contribution to nation building : @PiyushGoyal
The first and foremost criteria to be good citizens of this nation is to have pride in your nation : @PiyushGoyal
I am glad that the youth of today's India are moving away from being job seekers to becoming job generators : @PiyushGoyal

Indian youth with entrepreneurial spirits are going to create a story where India will lead the world : @PiyushGoyal
Rs.40,000 cr. can be saved every year just by converting all our lighting loads to LED : @PiyushGoyal
Cost of LED bulbs have fallen by 88% in the last 2.5 years & today the nation is selling more than 1 million bulbs everyday : @PiyushGoyal
If we plan that India will move to 100% electric vehicles by 2030, we could save Rs. 6,50,000 crore annually in our oil imports:@PiyushGoyal
When I first set the goal of 100% LED by 2019, nobody was willing to believe. It's we who have to believe in our ability : @PiyushGoyal
India doesn't have any patent of significance in so many years. Should we accept this, or start moving the needle? : @PiyushGoyal
We're looking to engage with our scientists to see if India can provide technology to the world : @PiyushGoyal
Innovation and research needs just that push and confidence in our ability to deliver is what will change India's destiny : @PiyushGoyal
भाग लो या भाग लो– it's our choice to either run away from challenges or participate in chasing big, bold and beautiful goals : @PiyushGoyal
We have the ability to change the world and if we take on these programmes, we take the programmes to scale : @PiyushGoyal
I'm delighted that over 1 crore families decided to forego their LPG subsidies and saved so many families from inhaling smoke : @PiyushGoyal
We worked day & night such that 99% of the adult population of India has UID, Aadhar card : @PiyushGoyal
With programmes like Give it Up and Organ Donation, we have the ability to make a huge influence on a large scale : @PiyushGoyal
We didn't adopt the financial inclusion programme to let it remain miniscule & sit on laurels that we have merely launched it : @PiyushGoyal
We are working to provide every citizen shelter, electricity, water, education & healthcare by 2022 : @PiyushGoyal

One mission that will succeed not by 2022 but well before that is to take power to every home in this country : @PiyushGoyal

I can assure you that one goal that will be achieved before deadline is Power for All : @PiyushGoyal
It's a new & empowered India we are looking at, which works together for a better tomorrow : @PiyushGoyal

I have no doubt that people-power, especially that of the youth will lead the world & show the path of prosperity & happiness : @PiyushGoyal
We've got to set audacious goals & we've got to have the confidence in our ability, and nothing is impossible my young friends:@PiyushGoyal
All our holy books, be it the Gita, Bible or Quran – everybody talks about positivity : @PiyushGoyal
The Gita tells us: we are kept from our goal not by obstacles but by a clear path to a bigger goal : @PiyushGoyal
It's time that we as a nation & we the young people of India start planning for the superpower that India once upon a time was: @PiyushGoyal

If we can scale up demand for e-vehilces and some tax concession, it will be enough impetus to make the programme successful : @PiyushGoyal
